description:
Furry friends are always good to have by their side. Or in this case, on their head. This cozy hand-knit toque will make sure your kiddo’s head stays nice and warm.

  • Chunky knit traps warmth
  • Inner fleece headband
  • Handmade in Nepal, as part of Ambler's Himalayan Collection, which helps more women in Nepal learn a skilled trade and create a livelihood that supports and empowers women in the developing world
name: Ambler Peek-A-Boo Hat - Infants to Children
